title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1732.4 - Report contents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1732.4 - Report contents

State Regulations

The energy audit report shall include the following
information: (a) an analysis of which
measures are appropriate to the audited building(s); (b) estimated cost of implementing those
measures; energy and costs savings which would result from action; and
estimates of the simple payback periods; and
(c) an executive summary of recommendations
and related estimates contained in the report. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1732.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
